title: Aqidah
accomplishments: Learned about tawhid, the oneness of Allah
Studied the pillars of iman and their significance in Islam
Understood the importance of akidah in daily life

title: Fiqih
accomplishments: Studied various aspects of fiqh including ibadah, muamalah
Applied fiqh principles in daily practices

title: Faraidh
accomplishments: Learned and applied the principles of inheritance and bequest in Islamic law
Understood the significance of the inheritance system in Islam
